message: Well, that's a bit exaggerated. You don't really have to use it if you don't want to ;-) There are probably quite a few people (me included) who will sometimes use that until you can mute certain discussions.
@Magazine3 it's an expression that people use with email or rss... when you have so many unread messages you are never going to catch up, you declare bankruptcy and start over with a fresh slate
oh, yeah, i also should have mentioned my happiness at finding it didn't cause a slow full page reload
btw, i wasn't being sarcastic... i like the feature!
The funny thing is that we had it since day one, but it was hard to find. Yesterday we made it ajax so it doesn't require a full page refresh, and today we made it easier to find.
No problem. Great work on the site! I've been inspired by it.
Whoops, fixed. Thanks for the report, @malero
